page.title: 13In our school playground
page.content: There are a lot of different games being played .The infants play a lot of imaginary games like starwars, monsters and heroes,The little boys have the best imaginations .The little girls like to play ponies, swings, skipping and chase.The eight year olds play schools a lot and twang.Twang is a complicated game in which two people stand about two metres apart with a big elastic band around their ankles the other player jumps in and out of the elastic in different patterns. As the game progresses you can raise the elastic. My age group play games like camels,football,chain tag and swings. We like single and bolt which is played around a large rectangle. One person stands in the rectangle and the others have to run past him either singly or in a group. Everyone has fun in the school playground.
